title: An Interview with the Legendary Mark Bell
description: Personal trainer, gym owner and fitness entrepreneur Mark Bell stops by the office to record an interview for his podcast, Powercast. Mark is a legend in the powerlifting world and has made some incredible strides with his business as well as for his personal brand. Both coming from athletic backgrounds, we had some fun here and discuss the similarities between business and sports, the impact of transparency because of Social Media, and getting in fights on the sidelines of our kid's sporting events ;) Make sure to check this one out !!
